title: Curriculum Vitae
content:
Hi everybody,

Please does anyone know the name of the typeface used for the name on this french Curriculum Vitae ?

I will be grateful for any help you can provide,

Tristan

Font: 

 Ever After 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094958/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content: **[Ever After](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094958/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Ever%20After%20-%20Regular&fid=125e5b86147b5bbffff34632d171a3a4&fsize=60&text=PHILIPPE%20BARANZINI&fit=1)** free font by Michael A. Hernandez Jr.
It's exactly the one I was looking for. Thank you so much.
Does anyone know the font which was used to write the words "technicien audiovisuel" ?

**[Labtop](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822094958/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Labtop%20-%20Regular&fid=2cc464d2cf9eabb082595e65764ff391&fsize=60&text=technicien%20audiovisuel&fit=1)** free font by Graham Meade [Apostrophic Labs, 2001] is very close
This one works. Thank you very much.
